scripts.androidReleaseDev: cd android && rm -rf build && rm -rf android/build && cd .. && react-native run-android --no-jetifier --variant=devRelease --appId 'com.base.appid.development'
scripts.androidReleaseStg: cd android && rm -rf build && rm -rf android/build && cd .. && react-native run-android --no-jetifier --variant=stagingRelease --appId 'com.base.appid.staging'
scripts.androidReleasePrd: cd android && rm -rf build && rm -rf android/build && cd .. && react-native run-android --no-jetifier --variant=productionRelease --appId 'com.base.appid.production'
scripts.androidApkDev: rm -rf build && rm -rf android/build && export ENVFILE=.env.development && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDevelopmentRelease && cd ..
scripts.androidApkStg: rm -rf build && rm -rf android/build && export ENVFILE=.env.staging && cd android && ./gradlew assembleStagingRelease && cd ..
scripts.androidApkPrd: rm -rf build && rm -rf android/build && export ENVFILE=.env.production && cd android && ./gradlew clean && ./gradlew assembleProductionRelease && cd ..
scripts.androidAabPrd: rm -rf build && rm -rf android/build && export ENVFILE=.env.production && cd android && ./gradlew clean && ./gradlew bundleProductionRelease && cd ..
